EmailTemplate.name: 2019.03.26 - BS - Monthly #4.2019.03.26 - BS - Monthly Offer #4
EmailTemplate.subject: This offer is one of our best
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
This Is The Real Deal Get $20 OFF** a laptop, printer or other office supplies when you spend over $100. Offer expires March 31, 2019. Use code: Shop Top Tech Computers, Laptops & Tablets Computer Accessories Printers & Scanners Mounts & Sit-Stand Solutions Customer Service <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/contact-us.aspx?cmp=EBCUSTOMERCARE2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> | Terms & Conditions <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/terms-and-conditions.aspx?cmp=EBTERMS2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> | Privacy Policy <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/privacy-policy.aspx?cmp=EBPRIVACY2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> Grand & Toy | 200 Aviva Park Drive, Vaughan, ON L4L9C7 | 1 866 391‑8111
*Free Shipping applies to orders of $50 or more. Minimum purchase required before taxes and after discounts. Orders outside our local delivery area, oversized and special order items do not qualify. Non-qualifying orders incur a shipping charge based on order size, weight and delivery location (minimum charge of $9.95). Other restrictions apply. See grandandtoy.com/terms or call 1-866-391-8111 for details.
**Must sign in to your account in order to use the promo code. Offer valid at www.grandandtoy.com only. Enter promo code 1903SAVE at checkout. Not valid on special furniture orders. Void if copied, sold, purchased, transferred, taxed or where prohibited. Cannot be combined with any other coupon, associate discount, or any other offers. Offer not valid on prior purchases or for credit card payments. No cash or credit back. Open to Canadian residents only. Cash value .001¢. Offer expires March 31, 2019.
